section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Nurse anesthetist" means a registered nurse who is:
Certified under this title to practice nurse anesthesia; and
Certified by the Council on Certification or the Council on Recertification of Nurse Anesthetists.

text.section: "Nurse midwife" means a registered nurse who is certified under this title to practice nurse midwifery and who is also certified by the American College of Nurse Midwives.
